title: Wii uDraw Pictionary [STAP78] [WBFS]
description:
As requested by "sazzyfrazz12" - enjoy, and seed, or I will find you... :-)

This is on TPB, but all seem to be 4.3GB ISO's do figured the 350MB WBFS version may be a bit nicer for you guys to download!

Game Name [ ID ] [ FORMAT] : Wii uDraw Pictionary [STAP78] [WBFS]
Language                   : ENGLISH (maybe others, not checked)
Type                       : Mini games - 101 to be precise...

** You must have the uDraw Tablet accessory (like in image) to use this game **


** IMPORTANT **
Please seed to at least 200%/2.0 each (i've got my uTorrent set to 500%/5.0).
Do not just leech and run. Help others get a chance to download it quickly too. I'm doing this to help. Please help too.

As ever, if you like it, maybe buy a Wii game to keep the franchise going as a thank-you for this freebie! Even better, get one not listed on here, and upload for me :-)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Most of my 700+ of my Wii games are listed here (text file format directory listing):         <a href="
http://txt.do/rbsm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://txt.do/rbsm</a> 

Feel free to search and see if there is a missing one you want me to upload - add a request in the comments and i'll try to help out.

Please Google the title or game ID if you want to know about this or any of the other games, as I can't remember half of them myself to answer any questions. Also check YouTube for a review/demo of games, as some are pretty crap (like Ninjabread Man and the Billy the Wizard - that was so crap I deleted it straight away, so not got that anyway!)
